title: 2 bedroom/1 Bath - Edgewater
posting_body: ['This is an owner occupied, mid-century, brick, up-down duplex on a quiet residential street.', '- 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1000 square feet', '- Partially furnished', '- Spacious living area with plenty of natural light', '- Recently renovated with new appliances and tiling', '- 3 large closets', '- Bamboo flooring throughout', '- No pets, no smoking, no exceptions', 'Edgewater is:', '- Walking distance to grocery, local breweries and cafes, Edgewater Public Market, 40 West Arts District', '- 1 mile to Sloans Lake city park, less than a mile to Edgewater Recreation Center and three public parks.', '- 3 miles to downtown Denver, adjacent to Wheatridge and Lakewood.', '- Convenient transportation, near RTD Lamar light-rail station, bus routes, and bike trails.', '- Plenty of on street parking available']
